definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: seek out, spy out, explore (NH id. (rare); perh. orig. turn (to or about), As. târu, turn about, back, taîru adj. turning back, also merciful, and subst. mercy; Ar. ta0ra (w) IV. go about (rare), tawrun a go-between)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[תַּרְתִּי]] Ez Eze 20:6, Ec 2:3; 3 pl. [[תָּרוּ]] Nu 13:32; 2 mpl. [[תַּרְתֶּם]] Nu 14:24; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יׇתֻ֫רוּ]] Nu 13:2, [[וַיׇּתֻ֫רוּ]] v:Nu 13:21; rd. also 3 ms., [[יׇתוּר]] Job 39:8 Vulgate Targum Ew Di Bu Du and most (for [[יְתוּר]]); 2 mpl. [[תָּתוּ֫רוּ]] Nu 15:39; Inf. cstr. [[תּוּר]] Nu 10:33 + ; Pt. pl. [[תָּרִים]] Nu 14:6, on 1Ki 10:15, 2Ch 9:14 v. infra;—

seek out, select: [[לָתוּר לָהֶם מִנוּחָה]] Nu 10:33 (J, subj. ark of ´[[י]]:), cf. De 1:33 (subj. ´[[י]]:), Ez Eze 20:6 (id., acc. land); sq. inf. = find out how  to do something, [[בְּלִבִּי לְ]] ´[[ת]]: Ec 2:3.

spy out, explore, acc. of land Nu 13:2, Nu 13:16, Nu 13:17, Nu 13:21, Nu 13:23, Nu 13:32, Nu 13:32, Nu 14:7, Nu 14:34, Nu 14:36, Nu 14:38, acc. of mts. Job 39:8 (v. supr.), cf. Pt. as subj. explores, spies Nu 14:6 (all P); explore mentally, [[וּבַקֵּשׁ חָכְמָה]] ´[[לָדַעַת וְלָת]]: Ec 7:25, cf. Ec 9:1 Gr (´[[ת]]: for [[בוּר]] q.v.), [[בְּחָכְמָה עַל־]] ´[[לָת]]: Ec 1:13 (Kue:Ond. 2, iii. 196).

go about, fig. [[אַהֲרִי לְבַבְכֶם]] Nu 15:39 (P); Pt. [[אַנְשֵׁי הַתָּרִים]] 1Ki 10:15, 2Ch 9:14, usually merchants (‖[[סׂחֲרִים רִכְּ לִים ]]); Kit, after SyrVer 2 Ch, prop. [[הֶעָרִים]] for [[הַתָּרִים]]

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיָּתִ֫ירוּ בְּבֵית־אֵל]] Ju Jdg 1:23 they made a reconnoisance at Bethel (Vrss disagree, Gie [[וַיַּחֲנוּ]], cf. GFM); 3 ms. [[יׇתֵר מֵרֵעֵהוּ]] [[חַדִּיק]] Pr 12:26 the righteous searches out (RV is a guide to) his friend, Targum AV is more excellent than (reading [[יׇתָר]]), Hi Ew De al. spies out his pasture ([[מִרְעֵהוּ]], in spiritual sense), all dubious; Toy conjectures [[יׇםֻר מֵרָעָה]].
